content.raw:
Yes, I used the default version in ign-math repository, by your suggestion now I am using jliang branch which has line3 class. I have changed installation directory  from .../ignition/math2/ignition/math/... to  .../ignition/math/...  for enabling robocup3ds project to find ignition headers, however I still have some linking errors after compiling like:
 
librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to `ignition::math::Box::Contains(ignition::math::Vector3<double> const&) const'

Currently I am trying to fix it.
content.html:
Yes, I used the default version in ign-math repository, by your suggestion now I am using jliang branch which has line3 class. I have changed installation directory from .../ignition/math2/ignition/math/... to .../ignition/math/... for enabling robocup3ds project to find ignition headers, however I still have some linking errors after compiling like:

librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to `ignition::math::Box::Contains(ignition::math::Vector3<double> const&) const'

Currently I am trying to fix it.
